item.title: Is Email Marketing Dead? Not Even Close…
item.dc:creator: Zoe
item.description: Email marketing often takes a back seat to the ever-present social media marketing, but it’s still a major player in the mix. I am a big fan of email marketing, and by the end of this post, I hope you will be too!

item.title: An Introduction to SEO Copywriting
item.dc:creator: Zoe
item.description: In the beginning, there was copywriting. Print marketing was big business in Don Draper’s day, but then Google came along. Now marketers have to write for two audiences simultaneously - the reader and the search engine.

item.title: Marketing as a Force for Good
item.dc:creator: Zoe
item.description: “The challenges ahead require us to do a great deal more than just putting a Fairtrade logo on products.” – Marketing Week
